page.title: 07Education in the area-cont.
page.content: The Peace Memorial Hall is used for playgroup. It is run by Mrs Almond, Mrs Maidment and Mrs Hooper.There are 49 children in playgroup and it is shared in beetween 3 days.Some people come from Heywood and Hawkeridge Playgroup has been known to be running for fifteen years.All the children usually go on long trips once a year.The hours are from 9.00 till 12.00.The days are Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. When the children in the top class of North Bradley School they leave the school at 11 years old they go to Matravers in Westbury or Clarendon in Trowbridge.
